EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudAA.XLE.webXLE.N.G.N.9898.XLE Gamechanger (Refresh).Email 1 - What can an
EmailTemplate.subject: What can an OpenStack cloud do for your business?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Change the game for your end users — and your business Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
You’re exploring the idea of cloud technologies for your enterprise. But your business is complex. How can you know if cloud is the right fit?
Look no further. Our one-page overview highlights the top five advantages of an OpenStack private cloud.
It’s time to change the game. Get the details now! To learn more about Nokia solutions for large enterprises, visit our OpenStack <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/openstack]]> page.
Sincerely,
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia
U.S. and Canada:+1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)
Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)
Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]> Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
